definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
clear/bright
general/popular/everywhere/universal

sentences.english: You could put half of Trump"s supporters into what I call the basket of deplorables."
sentences.chinese: 特朗普的半數支持者都是‘一籮筐可憐蟲’。

sentences.english: Melania is understood to be expecting to make the move to Washington.
sentences.chinese: 特朗普夫人梅蘭妮亞則很期待搬到華盛頓。

sentences.english: Mr Trump intends to rip up the US-created global order.
sentences.chinese: 特朗普打算撕毀美國創建的全球秩序。

sentences.english: Not quite all the action is anti-Trump.
sentences.chinese: 並非所有的行動都是反對特朗普的。

sentences.english: But it's hard to resist laughing at Trumpian syntax.
sentences.chinese: 但你很難忍住不去嘲笑特朗普的句法。

sentences.english: The president questioned whether Trump has "basic knowledge" on key issues.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬質疑特朗普是否對關鍵議題有“基本常識”。

sentences.english: Abe will most likely try to explain to the president.
sentences.chinese: 安倍晉三極有可能會努力向特朗普解釋該政策。

sentences.english: Baldwin then amplifies the gestures, and distills them.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，鮑德溫把特朗普的手勢進行誇大與提煉。

sentences.english: Mr. Trump won three crucial Midwestern states by very small margins.
sentences.chinese: 特朗普以非常小的優勢在中西部三個關鍵州取勝。

sentences.english: Ultimately, this is very much the White House that Trump wanted to build.
sentences.chinese: 最終，這在很大程度上就是特朗普想要打造的白宮。

sentences.english: The investment community is split on how Trump will impact gold prices.
sentences.chinese: 投資界對特朗普如何影響黃金價格有所分歧。
特朗普是個危險的傻瓜。

sentences.english: But Mr Trump's antagonism towards China is a gamble without an upside.
sentences.chinese: 不過，特朗普與中國對抗將是一場全無好處的賭博。

sentences.english: But Mr. Trump and his advisers would not release basic information about this plan.
sentences.chinese: 但特朗普和他的顧問不願公佈這個計劃的基本信息。

sentences.english: The president-elect of the US seems to subscribe to this one.
sentences.chinese: 美國侯任總統特朗普似乎贊同這一說法。

sentences.english: When will Trump begin deporting Hispanics?
sentences.chinese: 特朗普什麼時候開始驅逐西語裔？
